com.bukkit.dthielke.herochat
Class Channel

java.lang.Object
  com.bukkit.dthielke.herochat.Channel
Direct Known Subclasses:
LocalChannel
public class Channel
extends java.lang.Object

Channel creates the possibility for sending particular Minecraft chat messages only to members of a particular channel. This class holds everything necessary to moderate channels, assign and remove channel joining and speaking privileges, and send formatted messages to all its members.

sendMessage

public void sendMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player sender,
                        java.lang.String msg)
Sends a message to the players in the channel. The message is censored and formatted before sending. If a channel member has the sender on ignore, the message is not sent to the ignoring player.

Parameters:
sender - the player sending the message
msg - the message to be sent
